Package io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.match

Class MultipartRequestMatcher

java.lang.Object
org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<MultipartRequestContent>
io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.match.MultipartRequestMatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hamcrest.Matcher<MultipartRequestContent>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
public class MultipartRequestMatcher extends org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<MultipartRequestContent>
A Hamcrest matcher used to match MultipartRequestContent. The matcher may be created directly or by using the closure or consumer static configuration methods.

  • Method Details

    • multipartMatcher

      public static MultipartRequestMatcher multipartMatcher(Consumer<MultipartRequestMatcher> config)
      Creates a new multipart matcher with a consumer - it will have an instance of MultipartRequestMatcher passed into it for configuration of the matcher.
      Parameters:
      config - the configuration consumer
      Returns:
      a configured matcher instance

    • part

      public MultipartRequestMatcher part(String fieldName)
      Applies a matcher to match when a part with the specified field name exists in the multipart request (and has a non-null value).
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the field name
      Returns:
      a reference to this multipart request matcher

    • part

      public MultipartRequestMatcher part(String fieldName, org.hamcrest.Matcher<Object> value)
      Applies the specified content matcher to the part with the specified field name.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the field name
      value - the value matcher
      Returns:
      a reference to this multipart request matcher

    • part

      public MultipartRequestMatcher part(String fieldName, String value)
      Applies a matcher for the field part value where the value must be equal to the specified value. This is simply an alias to calling part(fieldName, equalsTo(value)).
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the field name
      value - the field value
      Returns:
      a reference to this multipart request matcher

    • part

      public MultipartRequestMatcher part(String fieldName, org.hamcrest.Matcher<String> contentType, org.hamcrest.Matcher<Object> value)
      Applies the specified content matcher and content-type matcher to the part with the specified field name.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the field name
      contentType - the content type matcher
      value - the value matcher
      Returns:
      a reference to this multipart request matcher

    • part

      public MultipartRequestMatcher part(String fieldName, String contentType, org.hamcrest.Matcher<Object> value)
      Applies the specified content matcher matcher to the part with the specified field name and where the content type starts with the specified string value. This is analogous to calling part(fieldName, startsWith(contentType), value).
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the field name
      contentType - the content type
      value - the value matcher
      Returns:
      a reference to this multipart request matcher

    • part

      public MultipartRequestMatcher part(String fieldName, ContentType contentType, org.hamcrest.Matcher<Object> value)
      Applies the specified content matcher matcher to the part with the specified field name and where the content type starts with the specified string value. This is analogous to calling part(fieldName, startsWith(contentType), value).
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the field name
      contentType - the content type
      value - the value matcher
      Returns:
      a reference to this multipart request matcher

    • part

      public MultipartRequestMatcher part(String fieldName, org.hamcrest.Matcher<String> fileName, org.hamcrest.Matcher<String> contentType, org.hamcrest.Matcher<Object> value)
      Applies the specified content matcher, file name matcher and content-type matcher to the part with the specified field name.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the field name
      fileName - the file name matcher
      contentType - the content type matcher
      value - the value matcher
      Returns:
      a reference to this multipart request matcher

    • part

      public MultipartRequestMatcher part(String fieldName, String fileName, String contentType, org.hamcrest.Matcher<Object> value)
      Applies the value matcher to the part with the specified field name, where the file name must be equal to the given string, and the content type must start with the specified value. This is analogous to calling: part(fieldName, equalTo(fileName), startsWith(contentType), value)
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the field name
      fileName - the file name
      contentType - the content type
      value - the value matcher
      Returns:
      a reference to this multipart request matcher

    • part

      public MultipartRequestMatcher part(String fieldName, String fileName, ContentType contentType, org.hamcrest.Matcher<Object> value)
      Applies the value matcher to the part with the specified field name, where the file name must be equal to the given string, and the content type must start with the specified value. This is analogous to calling: part(fieldName, equalTo(fileName), startsWith(contentType.value), value)
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the field name
      fileName - the file name
      contentType - the content type
      value - the value matcher
      Returns:
      a reference to this multipart request matcher

    • matches

      public boolean matches(Object item)
      Determines whether or not the given object matches the configured matchers.
      Parameters:
      item - the item being matched (must be an instance of MultipartRequestContent)
      Returns:
      whether or not the match is accepted

      public void describeTo(org.hamcrest.Description description)
      Describes the matcher.
      Parameters:
      description - the description container
